work.name: Learning Systems and Robotics Lab, Technische Universität München
highlights: Conducted experimental reinforcement learning using a reduced action space for efficient exploration of over-actuated environments.
Implemented a control pipeline for the Franka Emika FR3 robot using libfranka and ROS.
Developed a MuJoCo simulation environment for learning LEGO manipulation tasks with the Franka Emika Panda.

work.name: Tenstorrent Inc.
highlights: Maintained a Python script for parametric generation of chip interconnect networks, adding support for mesh interconnect topologies.
Created a SystemVerilog + C API to facilitate C-based Network-On-Chip tests in full-chip simulations.
Designed and optimized a RISC-V CPU for the data movement engine using the Chipyard Rocket Chip generator, including benchmarking and optimizing memory systems, bus widths, and CDC for improved PPA.

work.name: Computational Aerodynamics Group

Researched unconventional methods to accelerate mesh creation.
Implemented finite-difference algorithms to solve partial differential equations.

projects.name: Design and Training of Variant Chess Engine Using CNNs
projects.summary: Developed a chess engine for atomic chess using convolutional neural networks for board evaluation.
highlights: Supervised training of a CNN model to perform chess board evaluation function.
Implemented heuristic search for atomic chess using the trained evaluation function.

Implemented a scanning ultrasonic sensor for obstacle detection and pathfinding.
